All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeGraphFigure, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class AeBpelLinkFigure
extends AeBpelFigureBase

Draws the links between the source anchor point and the target anchor point.

See Also:
Serialized Form

updateBounds

public void updateBounds()
Calculates the bounding box of this link. The bounding box is the union of the source anchor point and the target anchor point. This method is updated when the source or target anchor points are updated.

getAnchorDirection

private int getAnchorDirection(java.awt.Rectangle aSourceRect,
                               java.awt.Rectangle aTargetRect,
                               boolean aSource)
Calculates and returns the direction of the link from source to the target.

Parameters:
aSourceRect - source bounding box
aTargetRect - target boudning box
aSource - true if we need to direction out of the source. If false, then the direction is into the target.

getAnchorPoint

private java.awt.Point getAnchorPoint(java.awt.Rectangle aRect,
                                      int aDir)
Calculates and returns the anchor point (x,y) coordinates (usually a mid point) given the bounding box and the direction.

Parameters:
aRect - bounding box of the anchor.
aDir - direction of incoming or out going link.
